page.title: 06CHILDREN'S ATTITUDES
page.content:
Results of survey to find out the thoughts of pupils aged 11-14.{ { {WHAT DO YOU HOPE FOR MOST ? : PERCENT _____________________________________ To be rich : 52 To get a good job : 28 World peace : 12 Good exam results : 8
{WHICH DO YOU FEAR MOST ? : PERCENT _____________________________________ Cancer : 67 Violence : 14 Loneliness : 11 Unemployment : 8
______________________________________ {: TRADITIONAL FEAR : %YES : %NO : ______________________________________ : Fear of spiders : 44 : 56 : ______________________________________
